title: what is this font ?
content:
Hi,

could someone tell me the name of the font used in this picture please ?  
regards,

Charles

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161256im_/http:/typophile.com/files/whatthefont_5611.jpg)
author: mnem0

comments.content: Moving this to TypeID - you might have better luck there.

Hi Charles,

could be [Folio](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161256/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/folio_b_medium_condensed_ot/&sample_text=INFORMATIQUE).

[Brown Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161256/http:/www.shinntype.com/brown.html), [Bulldog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161256/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/clubtype/bulldog/) or [BureauGrot](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161256/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/BureauGrot/styles) are also similar.  
F

——  
 [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161256/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "Frequently Asked Question – What do I enter in the “Title” line?")
